Here are some practical exercises for you to work on. The webpage will be updated with codes after the course weeks.

### Exercise 1

Make PCA plot using VST normalized data and compare it with PCA using TPM data. Write your inference.

### Exercise 2

Make UMAP using log2 CPM data and color the points based on BMI category and write your inference

### Exercise 3

Make a volcano plot with your own additional modifications

### Exercise 4

Perform gene-set enrichment results using any other gene-set and interpret the results

### Exercise 5

Make an another visualization of gene-set enrichment analysis results.
